title: New: Vacationer – Trip (Mmoths Remix)
content:
Following on from the release of his debut EP and a host of successful UK dates, Irish beatmaestro Mmoths has dropped a new remix of one of last years hottest tracks.

Emphasizing the original beat that made Trip one of 2011’s blog-hits, this remix is arguably Jack Colleran’s finest to date, sculpting what is already a fantastic pop track into a perfect chillout summer jam. Check it out below and grab a free download.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
